Nullam mollis arcu ut quam tempor, et fermentum nisl dictum." description_color="#70778b" alignment="wil-text-center"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset="vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8"][wilcity_vc_team_intro_slider get_by="contributor"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][wilcity_vc_heading blur_mark="Features" blur_mark_color="" heading="How can I earn money with WilCity?" heading_color="#252c41" description="WilCity provides the various ways that help you can earn money from your site." description_color="#70778b" alignment="wil-text-center"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][wilcity_vc_box_icon icon="fa fa-viacoin" heading="Paid Listings" description="This is the big money maker of your directory site. Listing owners will pay to get their places listed on your site."][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][wilcity_vc_box_icon icon="fa fa-asterisk" heading="Promoted Listings" description="You offer Promotion Plans, listing owners will have directories appeared at special spots on site, and at the top of search results page."][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][wilcity_vc_box_icon icon="fa fa-pencil-square-o" heading="Paid Claim Listings" description="Another revenue model to monetize from listing. You create a listing on your site and allow the business owner to claim it."][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" css=".vc_custom_1536210987299{background-image: url(http://wilcity.wiloke.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/pexels-photo-878998-300x300.jpg?id=3525) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column][wilcity_vc_heading blur_mark="Authors" blur_mark_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.3)" heading="Top Authors" heading_color="#f06292" description="Top 600+ famous authors on the WilCity" description_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.88)" alignment="wil-text-center"][wilcity_vc_author_slider role__in="administrator,contributor" orderby="post_count" number="8"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][wilcity_vc_heading blur_mark="" blur_mark_color="" heading="Trusted by over 30000+ users" heading_color="#252c41" description="Here is what some of them have to say about Wiloke" description_color="#70778b" alignment="wil-text-center"][wilcity_vc_testimonials testimonials="%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22Mark%20Alexander%22%2C%22testimonial%22%3A%22Life%20before%20WilCity%20was%20very%20chaotic%20-%20we%20got%20a%20lot%20of%20phone%20calls%2C%20a%20lot%20of%20mistyped%20orders.%20So%20with%20WilCity%2C%20the%20ability%20to%20see%20the%20order%20directly%20from%20the%20customer%20makes%20it%20so%20streamlined.%22%2C%22profesional%22%3A%22Designer%22%2C%22avatar%22%3A%222488%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22Randy%20Robinson%22%2C%22testimonial%22%3A%22We%E2%80%99ve%20increased%20our%20sales%20from%2020%E2%80%9335%25%20since%20we%E2%80%99ve%20implemented%20WilCity%20and%20would%20never%20look%20back.%22%2C%22profesional%22%3A%22Developer%22%2C%22avatar%22%3A%222485%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
